name: Extern
headline: Professional Experience Anytime, Anywhere.
description:
At Extern, we’re solving the experience gap.  Extern created the remote Externship, a skill-building work experience that is easier for students to access, and easier for companies to run, than an internship.  Our mission is to help anyone discover and launch their career through professional experiences available anywhere at any time.  Since 2020, we’ve created and powered Externships on behalf of companies from Fortune 500s to startups that have enabled tens of thousands of students to build real experience and open doors to incredible opportunity.  

After spending $100K on average for a 4-year degree, graduates find that almost 40% of entry level jobs on Linkedin required 3+ years of work experience. Internships are how many college students get this kind of experience, but the demand for good internships outstrips the supply. Internship programs are difficult to scale, they favor students who already have social capital, and they’re time-consuming for employers to run.

Externships are short, online, project-based work experiences that employers can offer to hundreds of students using less resource and employee time than it would take to support an intern.  Extern makes the complex process of running an Externship completely turnkey with software and industry experts which in turn makes professional experience more accessible to more students.

By making work experience more accessible, Extern is driving the rapid mobility and upskilling needed for a new economy.  We envision a world where anyone can access work experience as a form of education – no matter their background, experience, or socio-economic status.  Come join our movement to reshape work, education, and credentialing for future generations with the Externship.

Extern was born out of a pivot from Paragon One (W17) which initially focused on providing students with a career center-as-a-service platform, connecting them with industry professionals to receive career coaching and guidance.  Backed by Y Combinator, Foundation Capital, Launch Fund, University Ventures, and Learn Capital.
tags: industry:education; industry:marketplace; industry:elearning; industry:recruiting; industry:remote-work; location:new-york

founders.name: Matt Wilkerson, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Matt is the Co-founder & CEO of Extern (www.extern.com) which created the remote Externship, a new form of work experience that lets people quickly build their resumes while giving companies expert-designed, turnkey projects that drive business outcomes.  Extern was a pivot from Paragon One which was YC'W17.  Matt previously co-founded e-commerce marketplace AHAlife, started his career at Morgan Stanley and TCV, and holds degrees from MIT in Computer Science & Engineering and Management Science.

## Launching your career is harder than ever
For every 5 college students, there’s only 1 internship available. About 40% of entry-level job postings require at least three years of experience.The stakes have never been higher.
## Get professional experience that matters with Extern
  * Test drive career paths with real projects
  * Build your resume with skills you’ve applied
  * Connect with professionals from startups to Fortune brands


  * Develop soft skills through professional collaboration
  * Learn how to use Gen AI tools through real projects
  * Gain real project experience to discuss at job interviews


Flexibly explore careers through real experience

## How it works
Invest in yourself
$10
per month
 _That’s less than the cost of lunch_
[Apply Now](http://www.extern.com/<https:/app.extern.com/sign-up>)
1
Submit one application to access all Externships.
Apply once - like a common app - to become a member of Extern. If you’re accepted, you can sign up for any available Externship on our platform. 
2
Hear back in 1-2 weeks.
Gain full access to Extern for $10 per month once accepted.
3
Create your account and explore Externships.
There are a variety of externships by career path, skills, and projects. See what most aligns with your interests and goals.
4
Reserve your seat in the Externship of your choice to get started. 
Start tackling real projects at companies that will both build your experience and bring impact to the company.
## What past Externs have to say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/6722545cffbb1dbec592720c_AxhU293sJgIl4k65RSD4XY6qiiM.avif)

Beats by Dre Extern
"Extern played a crucial role in bridging the gap between my formal business education & real-world application. The opportunity to present actionable recommendations to the Head of Customer Insights at Beats by Dre was invaluable, propelling my leadership journey and paving the way for my current role at Rolls-Royce.”
Now a Project Lead at Rolls-Royce
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/672254002b14defbd3dac178_LinkedIn-Icon-Logo.wine.svg)](http://www.extern.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/erikschalk/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/6722564ea1e1f3fe100300e9_BPwgpy33M0BwCkgyK1SRUWs3fEo.avif)
**Tori Nguyen**
AT&T Extern

It allowed me to develop my skills, showcase my work and ultimately stand out so I was awarded the opportunity to interview the CEO of AT&T!”
Became an intern at AT&T
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/672254002b14defbd3dac178_LinkedIn-Icon-Logo.wine.svg)](http://www.extern.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/victoria-nguyen695/>)

Meta Extern

Now a Technical Program Manager at Meta
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/672254002b14defbd3dac178_LinkedIn-Icon-Logo.wine.svg)](http://www.extern.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/richardwilsonii/>)

Now an Analyst at Accenture
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/672254002b14defbd3dac178_LinkedIn-Icon-Logo.wine.svg)](http://www.extern.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/maisa-mirza/>)

HP Tech Ventures Externship
“If I hadn’t done a VC externship during term time, I know I’d be spending hours watching YouTube videos just to understand which careers I might enjoy! I don’t think I fully understood the value of an externship till I actually did one and now I want to argue that externships should be a part of the college experience for every student.”
Now an Analyst at Boston Consulting Group
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/672254002b14defbd3dac178_LinkedIn-Icon-Logo.wine.svg)](http://www.extern.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/garrett-boyce/>)

Crafted Capital Externship
“My Externship really changed my career trajectory. As students, we often chase after Fortune 500 work experiences, but the intimate experience of getting to work with a startup can actually really help you learn a lot and level up what you can bring to the table. My cohort even had the opportunity to speak with the founder of Crafted Capital and learn from his firsthand experience.”
Now a CLDP Analyst at JP Morgan Chase & Co

## Featured Externship
Dive into the world of consumer insights and market analysis with our Consumer Behavior & Market Analysis Externship, created in collaboration with Beats by Dre.This remote 8-week externship empowers students to understand consumer needs, map customer journeys, and leverage AI tools to conduct data-driven analysis that informs real business decisions.
Externship Details
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/6720ffed57e5cbf2a538f7cb_beatsbydre.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/6720fff1ec32c0fe932e8041_Beats_header.png)
Consumer Behavior & Market Analysis Externship
Starts:
November 11, 2024
Ends:
January 6, 2025
8 weeks, Part-time · Remote
Market Research
Consumer Insights
Data Analysis
AI Integration & Tooling
Marketing
Milestone 1
Introduction to Consumer Insights and AI fundamentals
Week 1
  * **Live Activities:** Meet your program and network with peers.
  * **Project Objective:** Build foundational knowledge in consumer behavior, customer journey mapping and prompting strategies.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Create a Super Prompt leveraging advanced prompt engineering techniques.
    * Develop an "Ideal Consumer List" based on company guidelines.
    * Create a Customer Journey Map using expert frameworks to understand key consumer touchpoints.


Output
Customer Journey Map, offering insights into consumer decision-making processes.
Milestone 2
Survey Design and Data Collection
Weeks 2, 3 & 4
  * **Live Activities:** Meet with the Beats by Dre company lead.
  * **Project Objective:** Master the process of creating and distributing surveys to gather valuable consumer data.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Design a survey form based on a research question.
    * Define your audience and how to reach them.
    * Use AI to generate targeted and expert-made survey questions.
    * Create an AI-powered chatbot to distribute your survey.


Output
Fully developed survey, Manychat chatbot designed for outreach, response tracker to track responses.
Milestone 3
Data Analysis and Visualization
Weeks 5 & 6
  * **Live Activities:** Share your work and get feedback from your manager and peers; Join live group support sessions.
  * **Project Objective:** Analyze survey data to extract quantitative and qualitative insights.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Conduct data analysis, using AI tools for deeper insight into consumer behavior patterns.
    * Visualize data findings to create clear, compelling insights.


Output
Data visualizations and analysis report, providing actionable insights from consumer data.
Milestone 4
Presenting Insights and Dashboard Creation
Weeks 7 & 8
  * **Live Activities:** Share your work and get feedback from your manager and peers; Join live group support sessions; Present consumer insights to Beats by Dre company lead and get live feedback.
  * **Project Objective:** Communicate insights effectively through presentations and dashboards.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Build a consulting-style presentation leveraging AI tools to build the perfect storytelling and design compelling slides
    * Build interactive data dashboard Claude.ai to showcase key findings.
    * Refine presentation skills and communicate insights to stakeholders.


Output
Professional presentation and interactive data dashboard, ready for real-world applications.
Milestone 5
Final Portfolio Deliverables
At the end of this externship, you will have:
‍
  * A **well-designed survey** to showcase your data collection skills.
  * An **AI-powered chatbot** for survey distribution.
  * A **consulting-style presentation/report** showing insights learned from the data.
  * An **interactive data dashboard** that demonstrates your ability to present data-driven insights.


## Questions we get all the time
How is an Externship different from a certificate program, bootcamp, or skill course?
Unlike a typical credential platform, Extern lets you…
‍
  * Demonstrate skills you built through real work on your resume
  * Demonstrate real business impact you drove on your resume
  * Connect with industry professionals and other externs
  * Engage and learn from our very own Program Managers who support you


How do Externships compare with internships?
For every 5 college students, there’s only 1 internship available. And if you're lucky enough to get an internship, there's no guarantee you're in for a meaningful experience when it comes to training and support. Externships were designed as accessible, high-quality experiences to bridge the divide between academia and the workforce.
‍
Extern provides…
Real professional experiences not normally accessible to students
Practical training on in-demand skills that you demonstrate through a real -work deliverable
Soft skills training and development in a supportive environment
‍
While also providing…
Flexibility year round with fully remote experiences
Ability to explore multiple industries, skills, and companies
Structured professional training beyond typical internships, like advanced prompting, Gen AI application, and creating custom chatbots to keep you ahead of the curve
‍
Who is eligible?
No prior experience or specific background is required - as long as you’re passionate, curious, and have a drive to learn.
‍
Currently, we’re prioritizing applications from:
  * Seniors in undergraduate (Bachelor’s) programs at U.S.-based institutions
  * Graduate students in Master’s, Doctorate, or Professional Degree programs at U.S.-based institutions


Extern’s mission is to make Externships accessible to all students, and we’re working to expand capacity to include more academic years, institutions, individuals who aren’t in school, and other regions. If you’re from a different group, we encourage you to apply now—your application will help ensure you’re among the first considered as we expand. To receive updates on expanded capacity, subscribe to our newsletter [here.](http://www.extern.com/<https:/www.extern.com/the-edge-newsletter/join>)
What exactly happens during an Externship?
You can see an example of the [Externship format](http://www.extern.com/<#featured-externship>) currently used in our Consumer Insights Marketing and Data Analysis program. It includes a week-by-week breakdown, highlighting the skills you’ll develop, the tools you’ll use, and your interactions with the host company.
Why is there a $10 monthly fee?
In addition to providing members with flexible company Externship opportunities not available anywhere else, the monthly fee enables members to receive structured professional training, mentorship & support throughout their Externship experience.
## Build your future

## Launching your career is harder than ever
For every 5 college students, there’s only 1 internship available. About 40% of entry-level job postings require at least three years of experience.The stakes have never been higher.

## How it works
Invest in yourself
$10
per month
 _That’s less than the cost of lunch_
Apply Now⟨5⟩
1
Submit one application to access all Externships.
Apply once - like a common app - to become a member of Extern. If you’re accepted, you can sign up for any available Externship on our platform. 
2
Hear back in 1-2 weeks.
Gain full access to Extern for $10 per month once accepted.
3
Create your account and explore Externships.
There are a variety of externships by career path, skills, and projects. See what most aligns with your interests and goals.
4
Reserve your seat in the Externship of your choice to get started. 
Start tackling real projects at companies that will both build your experience and bring impact to the company.

## Featured Externship
Dive into the world of consumer insights and market analysis with our Consumer Behavior & Market Analysis Externship, created in collaboration with Beats by Dre.This remote 8-week externship empowers students to understand consumer needs, map customer journeys, and leverage AI tools to conduct data-driven analysis that informs real business decisions.
Externship Details
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/6720ffed57e5cbf2a538f7cb_beatsbydre.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6573df751dbab4bb0aac132c/6720fff1ec32c0fe932e8041_Beats_header.png)
Consumer Behavior & Market Analysis Externship
Starts:
November 11, 2024
Ends:
January 6, 2025
8 weeks, Part-time · Remote
Market Research
Consumer Insights
Data Analysis
AI Integration & Tooling
Marketing
Milestone 1
Introduction to Consumer Insights and AI fundamentals
Week 1
  * **Live Activities:** Meet your program and network with peers.
  * **Project Objective:** Build foundational knowledge in consumer behavior, customer journey mapping and prompting strategies.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Create a Super Prompt leveraging advanced prompt engineering techniques.
    * Develop an "Ideal Consumer List" based on company guidelines.
    * Create a Customer Journey Map using expert frameworks to understand key consumer touchpoints.


Output
Customer Journey Map, offering insights into consumer decision-making processes.
Milestone 2
Survey Design and Data Collection
Weeks 2, 3 & 4
  * **Live Activities:** Meet with the Beats by Dre company lead.
  * **Project Objective:** Master the process of creating and distributing surveys to gather valuable consumer data.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Design a survey form based on a research question.
    * Define your audience and how to reach them.
    * Use AI to generate targeted and expert-made survey questions.
    * Create an AI-powered chatbot to distribute your survey.


Output
Fully developed survey, Manychat chatbot designed for outreach, response tracker to track responses.
Milestone 3
Data Analysis and Visualization
Weeks 5 & 6
  * **Live Activities:** Share your work and get feedback from your manager and peers; Join live group support sessions.
  * **Project Objective:** Analyze survey data to extract quantitative and qualitative insights.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Conduct data analysis, using AI tools for deeper insight into consumer behavior patterns.
    * Visualize data findings to create clear, compelling insights.


Output
Data visualizations and analysis report, providing actionable insights from consumer data.
Milestone 4
Presenting Insights and Dashboard Creation
Weeks 7 & 8
  * **Live Activities:** Share your work and get feedback from your manager and peers; Join live group support sessions; Present consumer insights to Beats by Dre company lead and get live feedback.
  * **Project Objective:** Communicate insights effectively through presentations and dashboards.
  * **Tasks:**
    * Build a consulting-style presentation leveraging AI tools to build the perfect storytelling and design compelling slides
    * Build interactive data dashboard Claude.ai to showcase key findings.
    * Refine presentation skills and communicate insights to stakeholders.


Output
Professional presentation and interactive data dashboard, ready for real-world applications.
Milestone 5
Final Portfolio Deliverables
At the end of this externship, you will have:
‍
  * A **well-designed survey** to showcase your data collection skills.
  * An **AI-powered chatbot** for survey distribution.
  * A **consulting-style presentation/report** showing insights learned from the data.
  * An **interactive data dashboard** that demonstrates your ability to present data-driven insights.


## Questions we get all the time
How is an Externship different from a certificate program, bootcamp, or skill course?
Unlike a typical credential platform, Extern lets you…
‍
  * Demonstrate skills you built through real work on your resume
  * Demonstrate real business impact you drove on your resume
  * Connect with industry professionals and other externs
  * Engage and learn from our very own Program Managers who support you


How do Externships compare with internships?
For every 5 college students, there’s only 1 internship available. And if you're lucky enough to get an internship, there's no guarantee you're in for a meaningful experience when it comes to training and support. Externships were designed as accessible, high-quality experiences to bridge the divide between academia and the workforce.
‍
Extern provides…
Real professional experiences not normally accessible to students
Practical training on in-demand skills that you demonstrate through a real -work deliverable
Soft skills training and development in a supportive environment
‍
While also providing…
Flexibility year round with fully remote experiences
Ability to explore multiple industries, skills, and companies
Structured professional training beyond typical internships, like advanced prompting, Gen AI application, and creating custom chatbots to keep you ahead of the curve
‍
Who is eligible?
No prior experience or specific background is required - as long as you’re passionate, curious, and have a drive to learn.
‍
Currently, we’re prioritizing applications from:
  * Seniors in undergraduate (Bachelor’s) programs at U.S.-based institutions
  * Graduate students in Master’s, Doctorate, or Professional Degree programs at U.S.-based institutions


Extern’s mission is to make Externships accessible to all students, and we’re working to expand capacity to include more academic years, institutions, individuals who aren’t in school, and other regions. If you’re from a different group, we encourage you to apply now—your application will help ensure you’re among the first considered as we expand. To receive updates on expanded capacity, subscribe to our newsletter here.⟨11⟩
What exactly happens during an Externship?
You can see an example of the Externship format⟨12⟩ currently used in our Consumer Insights Marketing and Data Analysis program. It includes a week-by-week breakdown, highlighting the skills you’ll develop, the tools you’ll use, and your interactions with the host company.
Why is there a $10 monthly fee?
In addition to providing members with flexible company Externship opportunities not available anywhere else, the monthly fee enables members to receive structured professional training, mentorship & support throughout their Externship experience.
## Build your future
Have more questions? 
Apply for an Externship⟨5⟩

generated_description:
**Extern: Bridging the Experience Gap**

Founded in 2019 and based in New York, Extern is transforming the way students gain professional experience, leveling the playing field for aspiring professionals across various backgrounds. Imagine spending an average of $100,000 for a degree, only to find that many entry-level positions demand years of experience—it's a disheartening realization. Extern's mission is clear: *Professional Experience Anytime, Anywhere.* 

At its core, Extern is addressing a significant issue—what they term the "experience gap." The conventional path to gaining work experience, namely internships, is often inadequate. The number of students seeking these opportunities dwarfs the available slots, and the traditional internships frequently cater to those with existing advantages, like strong social networks. This has led to tens of thousands of students missing out on critical professional development.

Enter Externships: a modern, remote, project-based alternative to internships that offers meaningful professional experiences at scale. By leveraging advanced technology, Extern allows companies—ranging from Fortune 500 giants to agile startups—to manage these externships with ease. This flexibility makes it simpler for employers to connect with hundreds of students, without the extensive resources that traditional internships require.

Extern's approach not only democratizes access to work experience but also accelerates skill development in an ever-evolving economy. With a vision where everyone can secure work experience as an educational vehicle, Extern is leading the charge to reshape how we perceive work, education, and credentials for future generations.

Originally pivoting from an earlier initiative called Paragon One—focused on career coaching—Extern has garnered backing from notable investors such as Y Combinator and Foundation Capital. Today, the team of 35 is passionately implementing innovative externship programs that empower students to explore diverse career paths through real, impactful projects.

For just $10 a month, students can submit an application to access a multitude of externships, diving into fields ranging from marketing to product development. By participating, they gain hands-on experience, build essential skills, and connect with industry professionals—all while remaining flexible and remote.

Extern is clearly not just filling a gap; it's opening doors. With their innovative externship model, they’re changing the narrative for students who are eager to step into real-world roles and asking us all to reconsider what vital experience truly looks like in today’s job market. For more information, check them out at [www.extern.com](http://www.extern.com).
